verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:76
verses.text: And out of the tribe of Naphtali; Kedesh in Galilee with her suburbs, and Hammon with her suburbs, and Kirjathaim with her suburbs.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:77
verses.text: Unto the rest of the children of Merari were given out of the tribe of Zebulun, Rimmon with her suburbs, Tabor with her suburbs:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:78
verses.text: And on the other side Jordan by Jericho, on the east side of Jordan, were given them out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the wilderness with her suburbs, and Jahzah with her suburbs,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:79
verses.text: Kedemoth also with her suburbs, and Mephaath with her suburbs:
